Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11694 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-11694 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package reaper is earlier than 3.1.1-6, affected by CVE-2018-11694
